attributes.action: make the BBC boycott future Eurovision song contests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems ridiculous that the BBC continues to (part) fund with license payers money the Eurovision song contest. Voting in the contest continually seems to be more about political friends and neighbors and less about the acts on show. Please pull out now so we can retain some dignity and not continue to unfairly receive politically minded points.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
